document_data.name: ''Psychic reservoir''
document_data.mainbody: A '''psychic reservoir''' was an item that was used by a [[mind flayer]] to store [[psionic]] energy for later use.
document_data.Description: A reservoir looked like illithid mucous that was bound in a clear membrane. It was often mounted on its owner's neck chain.
document_data.Recharge: A reservoir could be recharged with psionic energy. Recharging cost one hour of an illithid's concentration, as well as three times the energy that was stored in the end.
document_data.Users: It was often supplied to illithid sentinels in major tunnels that led into [[Oryndoll]].<ref name="DDGttU>
